CheckpointRace.2: Today, you will be taking on the Checkpoint Race
CheckpointRace.3: This race is to test your skills with the vehicle
CheckpointRace.4: You will need to race through the checkpoints to gain more time around the course
CheckpointRace.5: If you run out of time, you will lose the race
CheckpointRace.6:
So do not waste time while going around the course 
 GoodLuck

BeginnerRace.2: Today, you will be taking on the Beginner Race
BeginnerRace.3: This race is to test your skills with the vehicle and how you face an opponent
BeginnerRace.4: You will need to race through the course, passing checkpoints, and try and beat your opponent
BeginnerRace.5: If you do not beat the opponent, you will not be able to advance through the game
BeginnerRace.6:
So do not waste time while going around the course 
 GoodLuck

AdvancedRace.2: Today, you will be taking on the Beginner Race
AdvancedRace.3: This race is to test your skills with the vehicle and how you face an opponent
AdvancedRace.4: You will need to race through the course, passing checkpoints, and try and beat your opponent
AdvancedRace.5: If you do not beat the opponent, you will not be able to advance through the game
AdvancedRace.6: There will be to paths on this track, you may take either of them
AdvancedRace.7:
So do not waste time while going around the course 
 GoodLuck
